title: A Privacy-Preserving Information-Sharing Protocol for Federated Authentication
summary: This paper presents a privacy-preserving protocol for identity registration and information sharing in federated authentication systems. The goal is to enable Identity Providers (IdPs) to detect duplicate or fraudulent identity enrollments without revealing users personal data or enabling cross-domain correlation.
